Date: Thursday, 4/24/1988
Subject: Brady Anderson learns new position
Brady Anderson has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Kazuyoshi Tatsunami
Dear Sir,
Kazuyoshi Tatsunami has an AVG of .420 at A Lakeland Tigers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Juan Guzman
Dear Sir,
Juan Guzman has nothing more to prove at AA Glens Falls Tigers!
He has an ERA of 3.28 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

to promote him soon!
